trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANARK102_04552_SEQ_00<tab>Maru is evaluating you with an unsettling look.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANARK102_04552_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the elegant purse to Khanga.
TEXT_BANARK102_04552_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the pouch of mysterious dried goods to the Lominsan visitor.
TEXT_BANARK102_04552_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the familiar wooden crate to Maru.
TEXT_BANARK102_04552_MARU_000_001<tab>Tell me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─you're from Eorzea, ain't you?
TEXT_BANARK102_04552_MARU_000_002<tab>Just so happens we've got a deal lined up with an Eorzean trader, but... We don't want no trouble, is all. You don't mind actin' as my middleman, do you?
TEXT_BANARK102_04552_MARU_000_003<tab>Alright, you'll need to pick up our side of the bargain from a fisher called Khanga in Akyaali. Hand him this─he'll know what to do.
TEXT_BANARK102_04552_MARU_000_004<tab>Take what he gives you to the Eorzean trader at the docks in Yedlihmad, an' then report back with the goods once you've finished. Easy, right?
TEXT_BANARK102_04552_KHANGA_000_010<tab>Hm? What brings you here?
TEXT_BANARK102_04552_KHANGA_000_011<tab>Ah. Maru's “favor,” yes... I see you've brought payment in full.
TEXT_BANARK102_04552_KHANGA_000_012<tab>He wanted these seen safely into the hands of a certain Lominsan visitor. I assume I can trust you with the rest?
TEXT_BANARK102_04552_KHANGA_000_013<tab>Have you not a delivery to make?
TEXT_BANARK102_04552_LIMSAMARINER04552_000_020<tab>Ho, there! You wouldn't happen to be Master Maru's associate, now would you?

TEXT_BANARK102_04552_LIMSAMARINER04552_000_021<tab>Oh, good! I've been eagerly awaiting your arrival, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. Yours is my final trade, so it's back to the diamond of the Rhotano I go.

TEXT_BANARK102_04552_LIMSAMARINER04552_000_022<tab>These? Why, they're the finest dried ingredients this side of the Bounty! Make for a glorious soup stock...and fetch a glorious price, at that. Limsa Lominsa is a culinary capital, after all. For her chefs, only the very best will suffice.
TEXT_BANARK102_04552_LIMSAMARINER04552_000_023<tab>Well then, a pleasure doing business with you! This crate contains Master Maru's goods─send him my regards, yes?
TEXT_BANARK102_04552_MARU_000_030<tab>Did the deal go alright?

TEXT_BANARK102_04552_MARU_000_031<tab>Brilliant! I knew you were the right <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> for the job. I reckoned that skipper might've skipped clear away if one of us came lumberin' at him, fish or no...
TEXT_BANARK102_04552_MARU_000_032<tab>Oh, this? It's a prototype for a new kinda wheel. There's this really reputable company in Limsa that's comin' up with upgrades for our carts.
TEXT_BANARK102_04552_MARU_000_033<tab>We've gotta make sure we can handle any road now that we're ridin' all over the island. Can't wait to give these a spin...
